mapper.sql: id, user_id, serial_number, order_number, serial_money, before_money, comm_status, is_deleted, create_time, creater, update_time, updater
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tds_commission WHERE id=#{id} AND IS_DELETED='0'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tds_commission
user_id , serial_number , order_number , serial_money , before_money , comm_status , create_time , creater , update_time , updater , is_deleted ,
#{userId} , #{serialNumber} , #{orderNumber} , #{serialMoney} , #{beforeMoney} , #{commStatus} , #{createTime} , #{creater} , #{updateTime} , #{updater} , '0' ,
mapper.update:
UPDATE tds_commission
user_id = #{userId}, serial_number = #{serialNumber}, order_number = #{orderNumber}, serial_money = #{serialMoney}, before_money = #{beforeMoney}, comm_status = #{commStatus}, create_time = #{createTime}, creater = #{creater}, update_time = #{updateTime}, updater = #{updater},
WHERE id=#{id} and is_deleted='0'
